data.comment: The big names in today's match at Olympia have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Helsingborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hacken close to the penalty box.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Can Helsingborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hacken's half?
Helsingborg's Martin Olsson misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Hacken at Olympia.
In the minute 5, Adam Ladeback awards Hacken a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Helsingborg.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 11, Alexander Soderlund for Hacken gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
Hacken's Daleho Irandust breaks free at Olympia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 12, Helsingborg have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Helsingborg have a dangerous throw-in.
At Olympia, Brandur Hendriksson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
Kebba Ceesay (Helsingborg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Adam Ladeback signals a Hacken throw-in in Helsingborg's half.
Hacken's Daleho Irandust gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 19, Adam Ladeback awards Helsingborg a goal kick.
Hacken drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 22, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Helsingborg.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 25, Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Helsingborg Helsingborg drive forward through Max Svensson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Helsingborg at Olympia.
In the minute 28, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken just outside Helsingborg's area.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
In Helsingborg Hacken attack through Daleho Irandust. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the home team in Helsingborg.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Andreas Landgren is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in high up the field for Helsingborg in Helsingborg.
Jakob Voelkerling Persson is replacing Andreas Landgren for Helsingborg at Olympia.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Helsingborg.
In Helsingborg, Alexander Soderlund of Hacken is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
In the minute 37, Patrik Walemark for Hacken gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Olympia.
Patrik Walemark (Hacken) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
In the minute 38, In Helsingborg Helsingborg attack through Anthony van den Hurk. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Helsingborg.
Hacken needs to be cautious. Helsingborg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Adam Ladeback signals a throw-in for Hacken, close to Helsingborg's area.
Hacken's Viktor Lundberg breaks free at Olympia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
Can Helsingborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Helsingborg to check on Jakob Voelkerling Persson, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Helsingborg at Olympia.
Hacken have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Helsingborg.
Helsingborg's Max Svensson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Adam Ladeback awards Hacken a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Helsingborg.
The first half has been concluded at Olympia.
Olof Mellberg is making the team's second substitution at Olympia with Erik Figueroa replacing Jakob Voelkerling Persson.
Adam Ladeback has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Adam Ladeback awards the away team a throw-in.
Hacken to take a throw-in in Helsingborg territory.
Hacken push forward at Olympia and Viktor Lundberg gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Helsingborg defence.
In the minute 47, Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hacken's Ahmed Yasin is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hacken have a goal kick.
Hacken are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 51, Daleho Irandust (Hacken) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Hacken attack but Godswill Ekpolo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Helsingborg at Olympia.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 54, Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joseph Ceesay (Helsingborg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Helsingborg in the half of Hacken.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Helsingborg.
Hacken drive upfield and Daleho Irandust gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Helsingborg defender.
In the minute 59, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Rasmus Lindgren (Hacken) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 61, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Hacken are whistled for offside.
Hacken's Daleho Irandust gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Helsingborg defender.
In the minute 63, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helsingborg drive upfield and Max Svensson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hacken defender.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Helsingborg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Adam Ladeback awards Helsingborg a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Helsingborg!
In the minute 69, Adam Andersson for Hacken has been booked by Adam Ladeback and receives a first yellow card.
Brandur Hendriksson of Helsingborg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 71, Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Hacken to take a throw-in in Helsingborg territory.
Ali Youssef is replacing Patrik Walemark for the away team.
In the minute 73, Throw-in Hacken.
Max Svensson (Helsingborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Hacken close to the penalty box.
Hacken's Adam Andersson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
In the minute 75, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Free kick Helsingborg.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Hacken at Olympia.
Helsingborg are coming forward and Brandur Hendriksson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Hacken at Olympia.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 80, Andreas Alm (Hacken) is making a second substitution, with Johan Hammar replacing Alexander Soderlund.
Hacken make their third substitution with Kevin Yakob replacing Viktor Lundberg.
In the minute 82, Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Helsingborg's half?
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 84, In Helsingborg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mohammed Abubakari (Helsingborg) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 85, Hacken have a dangerous throw-in.
Hacken are caught offside.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Helsingborg.
In the minute 87, In Helsingborg Helsingborg attack through Brandur Hendriksson. The finish is off target, however.
Adam Ladeback awards Hacken a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Helsingborg.
Adam Ladeback awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, The home team have replaced Max Svensson with Alex Timossi Andersson. This is the third substitution made today by Olof Mellberg.
At Olympia the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Helsingborg.
That's full-time at Olympia. The final score is 0-0.
